Thanks for contacting Backdrop CMS.

If you have a question about how use or extend Backdrop, you might get a faster response by posting in the Backdrop Forum: https://forum.backdropcms.org

We will get back to you as soon as we can,

- Your friendly Backdrop teammates

Thanks for contacting the Backdrop CMS Security Team.

We take all security issue seriously and try to address with them as quickly as possible. A member of the Backdrop CMS Security Team should be contacting you shortly.
